inn1.comm: good length delivery, again bowled from wide of the crease and coming in with the arm, this time though, Dilshan gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
slightly short and close to the off stump line, Dilshan goes for the cut and ends up with an inside edge. No room to go for the cut there and Dilshan played at it with zero footwork
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, this time Dilshan manages to tap it back down the track, not a convincing shot
second time lucky -  again short and outside the off stump, no real width there, Dilshan goes for the cut and ends up with an inside edge to the fine leg fence.

gone! Not so lucky on this occasion, again a short delivery outside the off stump and this time the ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the stumps. Once again Dilshan was looking to cut it away behind point and was beaten by the lack of pace.
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Jayasuriya just about manages to punch it back down the track. Looks like a slow track and the ball is stopping a bit
worked away off the pads to the square leg region
played away on the off side

Bond too joins the party! short of a good length delivery, was bit wide outside the off stump and Jayawardene tries to run it down but is beaten by the extra bounce and ends up playing it straight to Ros Taylor at first slip.
good length delivery, worked away on the leg side for a single
defended on the front-foot
good length delivery on the stumps, Sangakkara stays back and defends it down watchfully
on the middle and off stump line, played away towards cover - no room for a single there
full and on the pads, Sangakkara plays late and clips it away to the deep backward square leg fence. Excellent timing and placement
good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara covers the line and leaves it through to the keeper

short of a good length delivery, drifting down the leg side. Sangakkara moves across a bit and taps it down to fine leg, gets it well wide of the fielder in the deep and they comfortably come back for the second
on the middle and off stump line, much better line from the big man and Sangakkara watchfully plays it down to mid-off
good length delivery on the stumps, Jayasuriya pushes forward and defends it down on the off side
on the middle and off stump line, defended off the front-foot
short of a good length delivery, pitch close to the off stump line and this one shaped away a touch. Jayasuriya leaves it through to the keeper
effort ball on the middle and off stump line, not a quick delivery but Jayasuriya is not interested and he sways away from the line
defended outside the off stump

maiden over! pitched up outside the off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward to the pitch of the delivery and drives it straight to the fielder at mid-off. Good looking shot but the ball went straight to the fielder
worked away off the pads to the midwicket region
bit of width offered outside the off stump and Jayasuriya has a go at it, connects well but finds the fielder at short cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
punched down to mid-off, the fielder is deep and they scamper through for a single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara pushes forward and defends it down on the off side
pitched up outside the off stump, this time Sangakkara manages to drive it wide of Vettori at mid-off
clipped away off the pads, straight to the fielder in front of square leg
drifting down the leg side and Sangakkara defends it down on the leg side
on the middle and leg stump line, Sangakkara walks across the stumps and turns it away to square leg

defended down to mid-off, once again played with soft hands and a quick single is added to the total. Vettori's throw at the bowler's end fails to hit the stumps - direct hit would have been interesting
turned away off the pads to the fine leg region

half a chance - good length delivery on the middle and off stump line and Jayasuriya tries to lift it over the infield but ends up hitting it in the air to the square leg region, bit of a mis-hit. Oram rushed in from the deep but failed to make it across in time
driven wide of the fielder at cover
again pushed wide of the fielder at cover
defended down on the leg side, no room for a single there
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara shoulders arms
on the middle and off stump line and Sangakkara is made to defend, ball rolls back to the bowler.
short delivery outside the off stump and this one stayed low after hitting the deck. Jayasuriya leans back and cuts hard and is beaten by the lack of bounce
played away off the back-foot to the cover region
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, excellent line this from Bond. Jayasuriya gets forward and taps it down to mid-off

that's the end of that! short and wide outside the off stump, Jayasuriya goes for the cut, ball clips the top edge and flies straight to Butler at third man who nicely settles under it. Sri Lanka three down and in trouble here
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera stands tall on the back-foot and defends it with a straight bat
wayward delivery outside the off stump
attempted slower delivery, ends up as a fulltoss outside the off stump and Samaraweera punches it back past the bowler. The outfield slows the ball down the fielder from mid-off catches up
left alone outside the off stump
worked away off the pads to the square leg region
fuller length delivery, this one came in with the angle. Samaraweera gets behind the line and punches it straight back down the track
defended down to mid-on
good length delivery, close to the off stump line. Samaraweera moves across and taps it away on the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera pushes forward and defends it straight back to the bowler
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line and Sangakkara is made to defend
straight delivery and that's turned away straight to the man at midwicket
looks to drive off the back-foot but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball just rolls down to silly mid-off
good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and probably the off-cutter. Sangakkara gets well forward and defends it back to the bowler
pitched up in the slot outside the off stump, Sangakkara gets forward and drives hard - a good looking shot but the ball finds the fielder at short cover
it is! pitched up outside the off stump and Sangakkara drives it down to mid-on where a diving stop saves runs.
good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera gets forward and defends
short rising delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera stands tall and awkwardly plays it away behind square on the leg side
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended off the front-foot
hint of away swing - pitched wide outside the off stump and shaping away further. Sangakkara leaves it through to the keeper
worked away to the vacant midwicket region, easy single added to the total
short and in the channel outside the off stump, bit of extra bounce and Samaraweera drops his wrists and allows the ball to go through to the keeper
pushes to the onside, and Sangakkara pushes to mid-on and pushes Butler, who stood his ground, as he took off for a single.
defended to the onside.
moves forward and drives to mid-off, not much timing there.
keeps a bit low outside the off stump, moves across and plays to the onside.
played off the back foot to covers.
driven past the cover fielder and Elliot from extra cover makes a good save.
good length delivery defended to the onside, Oram moves across to field it.
defends with an open face to backward point.
works it forward of square leg to the deep.
on the legs and nicely worked away behind square leg to the deep.
moves forward and defends to the onside.
good length delivery defended down at his feet.
back of a length delivery punched nicely through covers for a single.
good length delivery defended back to the bowler.
moves forward and once again plays back to the bowler.
slower delivery and Sangakkara pushes to mid-on and takes off for a quick single, Elliot fields the ball dives forward and strikes the stumps but the batsman was well in.
pushes to mid-on for a single.
defended to the off side.
pushes through covers for a single.
driven to mid-off, a mistimed shot.
pushes on the front foot to mid-off.
driven firmly to mid-off along the ground but straight to the fielder.
dabs it behind point, straight to fielder.
moves forward and drives through cover to the sweeper for a single.
under-edges past the keeper.
cut behind point, no timing again.
another mistimed cut to point.
defended to short cover.
Butler picks up Sangakkara as he looks to put the delivery somewhere on the onside, miscues it high in the air forward of square leg, Oram runs in and takes a good catch.
driven firmly along the ground to short cover.
low full toss played back to the bowler.
glides it down to third man for a single.
moves into line and works to midwicket for a single.
bad delivery from Oram down the leg side, Kandamby plays it to fine leg and Elliot running around does well to save couple of runs.
defends with an open face to backward point.
wide outside the off stump and left alone by Kandamby.
good length delivery defended to the off side.
worked away to the onside to midwicket.
mistimes the push to short cover.
nudges it forward of square leg to the deep for couple of runs.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
works through the onside to midwicket for a single.
good length delivery defended to short cover.
defended to midwicket.
strikes the pad as he looks to work it to the onside.
once again mistimed drive back down the track.
plays it late down to third man for a single.
works it off his front foot past midwicket to the deep.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
pitched outside the leg stump and pushed to the onside.
cuts it hard behind point to the deep for a single.
comes forward and plays down the track.
comes forward and defends to mid-off.
moves forward and works to the onside.
flat outside the off stump, cut it away to backward point for a single
full and on the off, turned away straight to the fielder at midwicket
worked away with the turn to the midwicket region, fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single
driven off the front-foot to the mid-on region and Kandamby turns it away through square leg
pitched up on the pads and
flat delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera gets well forward and drives it down to long-off
quicker delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended stretching well forward
edged away past the bowler to the third man region, came off the bottom edge and the ball fell in front of the keeper
slightly short and turning away, Samaraweera goes back and across and drives it away through cover
turned away off the pads to the deep midwicket region
width offered outside the off stump, Samaraweera sways back and cuts it away well in front of point - easy single
comes down the track and drives it down to long-on
bowled from round the stumps and on the middle and leg stump line, Kandamby goes for the sweep but fails to make contact, appeal for lbw turned down
worked away on the leg side
stretches forward and drives it down to mid-on, the fielder it at the edge of the circle and the batsmen scamper through for a single
forced away well in front of point
played straight back to the bowler
flat delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera moves forward and across and paddles it past the keeper to deep fine leg
close to the off stump line, Kandamby comes down the track and pushes it straight back to the bowler
comes down the track and lofts it over the fielder at midwicket
punched down to long-on, easy single
tossed up on the middle and off stump line, Samaraweera gets inside the line and drives it inside out to long-off
clipped away to deep midwicket, was bit quicker than the previous delivery and Kandamby picked it up nicely
defended down the track
pitched outside the off stump and this one went straight on, Kandamby keeps his eye on the ball and leaves it through to the keeper
turned away towards midwicket, the slow bowlers are doing a good job here
bit of turn and on the middle and off stump line, Kandamby pushes forward to defend and the ball rolls away off the inside edge
defended stretching well forward
width offered outside the off stump and Kandamby cuts it away behind point
Maiden! quicker delivery and Kandamby is beaten for pace, ball rolls away of the pad and an appeal for lbw is turned down.
slightly short and bit wide outside the off stump, Samaraweera goes back and cuts it away through cover point. Made it look easy
tossed up outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward

Kandamby perishes! flat delivery outside the off stump, Kandamby comes down the track and hits it away on the leg side but fails to keep it down, Ros Taylor at short midwicket dives across and takes an excellent low catch.
on the middle and off stump line, defended back to the bowler
again defended back down the track
tossed up outside the off stump, Mathews pushes forward to defend and the ball rolls away off the inside edge
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended watchfully
attempted bouncer, not well directed and the ball goes down the leg side
finally a four! pitched up outside the off stump, Samaraweera gets well forward to the pitch of the delivery and hits through the line to the long-on fence. Clean hit
defended off the back-foot to the cover region

short delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera stands tall and defends it away towards point and takes off for a single but Mathews is not interested. Ryder moves across and has a go at the stumps but fails to hit the target
defended away on the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of reverse swing? Mathews gets forward and plays it down to mid-on
driven back, Vettori moves across to his left and cuts off the single
pitched close to the off stump line and turning away, Samaraweera waits for the ball to turn and at the last moment cuts it down to third man for a single
driven with a straight bat and down to long-off for a single
turned away across the turn to the short midwicket region
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Mathews pushes forward to defend and the ball runs away off the inside edge to the vacant square leg region
fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Samaraweera drives it down to long-off
good length delivery outside the off stump, once again the ball stops a bit after hitting the deck. Samaraweera reads it well and taps it away wide of the fielder at cover - easy single
short delivery down the leg side, Mathews goes for the pulls but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the thigh pad
short delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera stands tall and runs it down to third man for a single - got right on top of the bounce and at the last moment opened the face of the bat, nice shot
another short delivery and this one stays low, Mathews somehow taps it away on the leg side, well played in the end
slower delivery but wide outside the off stump, Mathews plays well away from his body and ends up with an inside edge to fine leg
short delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Mathews neatly pulls it away to the fine leg fence. End of a good over for Sri Lanka
flat delivery on the middle and off stump line, driven inside out to the man at extra cover
gives it bit of air, probably the arm ball - Samaraweera pushes forward to defend and ends up with an inside edge on to the pad
defended outside the off stump
short delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera gets forward and cuts it away behind point, there is no protection in the deep and the ball races away to the fence. Lovely shot
pushed straight to Ryder at backward point
forced away off the back-foot to deep cover, easy single to end the over
played back to the bowler.
slower through the air, Samaraweera plays too early as he pushes at the delivery.
nudges it behind square leg for a single.
tossed up outside the off stump, comes forward and defends down the track.
shorter in length, turned and bit more bounce, lets it go as the ball takes the thigh pad.
nudges to square leg for a single.
a touch short and punched off the back foot to mid-off.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
moves back and looks to force it, mistimes it.
comes forward and defends to the off side beside the track.
tossed up on the leg stump, driven down the ground to long on for a single.
on the leg stump, moves forward and drives down the ground to long on.
played back to the bowler.
mistimes the cut to the off side.
a leading edge to mid-off as Mathews looks to work it to the onside.
played wide of midwicket for a single. That single brings up the 100 for Sri Lanka.
takes it on the full and sweeps it to fine leg for a single.
moves back and pushes to the off side.
another dot ball, played back to the bowler.
wonderful shot, steps down the track and plays inside-out through and over extra cover to the fence.
slower through the air and played behind point.
another firm cut shot but cannot find the gap, straight to the fielder.
drives past the extra cover to the deep, coming for the second run as the throw comes in and Vettori fails to collect the ball, it would have been close.
nudges it behind square leg and picks up an easy single.
moves back and pulls a short ball in the air to deep extra cover.
comes forward and works to the onside forward of square leg.
waits for the turn and nudges it behind square leg.
pushes down the ground to long on and that brings up the 50 for Samaraweera.
works it to the onside for a single.
full length delivery driven firmly past mid-off and the ball races to the fence.
defended to the off side.
back of a length delivery, Mathews gets behind in line and defends to the off side.
moves back and forces to extra cover, can't get through the field.
moves forward and drives to mid-off.
that is tickled down the leg side to the fence for a boundary, that was terrible delivery, short and down the leg side.
good shot, that is creamed through extra cover and to the fence.
punches off the back foot through the off side.
on the middle and leg, nudged down to fine leg.
moves back and plays square of the wicket on the off side for a single.
comes forward and plays to the off side to extra cover.
played down the ground to long off for a single.
played softly behind point, unable to find the gap, straight to Ryder.
plays square of the wicket off the back foot to the deep for a single.
full delivery driven firmly along the ground but straight to the fielder at short extra cover.
plays with an open face off the back foot down to third man for a single.
moves across and works it in the gap through midwicket to the deep to pick up couple of runs before Guptill fields the ball.
plays it late as he opens the face off the bat and glides it down to third man.
clips it off his legs to deep backward square leg for a single.
good tight line from Tuffey, back of a length delivery defended to the off side.
pushes to point for a single.
cuts it well but again picks out the fielder at backward point.
pushes on the front foot, gets the inside half off the bat and back to the bowler.
opens the face off the bat and plays behind point to pick up a single.
wide outside the off stump and glides it down with an horizontal bat down to third man.
moves inside the line and works it forward of square leg to the deep.
a flowing drive on the up through covers to the sweeper.
opens the face off the bat and plays to the left of backward point for a single.
good length and a slower delivery, comes forward to defend and gets an inside edge down at his feet.
dabs it down to third man for a single.
defended outside the off stump
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, played straight to the fielder at short third man
good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera steps forward and lofts it over the fielder at midwicket - that's the way to go
better line from Tuffey and Samaraweera plays it straight to the fielder at backward point - missed out there
four more! good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera goes down on one knee and paddles the ball over the fielder at short fine leg. Excellent shot
punched off the back-foot to deep cover and Samaraweera will retain the strike. 9 runs off the over, a good one for Sri Lanka.
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
short delivery outside the off stump, was the off-cutter - Samaraweera stays back and cuts it down to third man for a single
close to the off stump line, quicker delivery this time and Mathews defends it down on the off side
fuller length delivery on the pads and Mathews turns it away wide of the fielder at midwicket
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven just wide of the fielder at short third man
drifting on to the pads, Mathews stays back and looks to work it away fine but fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad to the short fine leg region. Good over from Oram
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended

pitched up wide outside the off stump and Mathews drives it through covers and gets it well wide of the fielder in the deep. Guptil fires in a good throw from the deep but fails to hit the stumps at the bowler's end. Close call
worked away on the leg side for an easy single
good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera moves across and runs the ball straight to the fielder at short fine leg
good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera swings across the line but fails to make contact. McCullum fails to collect the ball cleanly - stumping chance missed, tough one though
cut away behind point, diving stop saves runs but fails to cut off the single
fulltoss and Samaraweera ends up playing it down to long-on, missed out there on some easy runs
turned away off the pads to the backward square leg region, the first run is taken quickly and they comfortably come back for the second - excellent running between the wickets
short delivery on the stumps, Mathews stays back and pulls it away through square leg
bit of width offered outside the off stump but Samaraweera fails to make contact, trying to cut the ball - ends up playing underneath the ball
worked away behind square on the leg, once again the first run is taken quickly and they scamper through for the second
good yorker to end the over, defended back to the bowler
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region
punched down to long-on and the single brings Samaraweera on strike
take that! full and on the stumps, Samaraweera makes room and drives inside out through cover. Good clean hit and the placement was spot on
pitched up on middle and leg, Samaraweera leans forward and turns it away on the leg side but fails to get it past the fielder at short midwicket

Samaraweera! another fuller length delivery and once again Samaraweera hammers it through the gap between the cover fielder. The ball was up there to be hit and Samaraweera nicely opened the face of the bat at the last moment to get the placement right. Top shot
four more! Butler strays down the leg side and Samaraweera neatly turns it away past the fielder at short fine leg. End of a fantastic over for Sri Lanka
short delivery outside the off stump and Mathews pulls it down to mid-on
good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera leans forward and across and drives it away through cover point
slower delivery, Mathews taps it down on the leg side towards mid-on and they scamper through for a single - excellent cricket
another slower delivery outside the off stump and Samaraweera pushes it away towards point, easy single
punched off the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards cover, the fielder is deep and once again the batsmen scamper through for a single
width offered outside the off stump, Samaraweera looks to runs it past the fielder at backward point but ends up hitting it straight to the fielder
fulltoss outside the off stump, Mathews drives off the back-foot to the point region
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera tries to scoop it over the fielder at short fine leg but fails to make contact. Half hearted appeal for lbw turned down
edged but shot! slower delivery, Samaraweera comes down the track and drives hard, ends up with an outside edge and the ball falls short of the keeper
yorker on middle and leg, Samaraweera swings across the line and ends up with an inside edge on to the pad
good length delivery outside the off stump, Mathews comes down the track, gets to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it down to the vacant long-off fence, he moves to 48
fuller length delivery, flicked away to short fine leg for a single
fifty! good length delivery outside the off stump, Mathews stays back and taps it away towards cover for a single. Excellent innings
slower delivery outside the off stump, well wide of the off stump and Samaraweera steers it straight to the fielder at short third man
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Mathews moves across and taps it away well in front of point
pitched up outside the off stump, Samaraweera plays it away behind point and they scamper through for a single. Throw at the bowler's end hit the stumps but Samaraweera was never in trouble
bowled'm! good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Mathews looks to run it down fine but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the woodwork. End of a fine partnership
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Kulasekara looks to tap it away on the off side but ends up with an inside edge.
hundred! comes down the track and swings hard, ball clips the outside edge and runs away behind point and the fielder there fails to stop it cleanly.
swing and a miss outside the off stump
moves across and defends it down on the off side, 200 comes up
width offered outside the off stump and Samaraweera flays it away to the backward point fence
Samaraweera's fine innings comes to an end. Full and on the stumps, Samaraweera looks to scoop it away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the stumps.
swing and a miss, ball rolls away off the pad
good length delivery outside the off stump, Thushara swing hard but gets no where near the ball
lofted away to deep midwicket, fielder moves across quickly from long-on and cuts off the boundary
short of a good length delivery on the stumps, Thushara makes room and hits it down to long-on. There is protection in the deep and they settle for a single
hit away off the back-foot to the cover region
short and wide outside the off stump, Thushara cuts hard and the ball flies off the top edge to the vacant third man region
lovely shot to end the innings! good length delivery outside the off stump, Kulasekara makes room and flays it away behind point. No stopping that

inn2.comm: starts off with a good length delivery outside the off stump and McCullum punches it away towards cover
good length delivery outside the off stump and McCullum drives square on the off side
in the channel outside the off stump, McCullum pushes forward and drives it away towards cover, fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single
another line and length delivery, defended watchfully
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, shaping in a touch - McCullum stands tall and defends it straight back to the bowler
good length delivery, pitched in line and this one nipped back in sharply, McCullum tries to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact. Appeal for lbw turned down, was missing leg
short and wide outside the off stump, Ryder cuts hard but fails to make contact

Thushara strikes! that's the start they wanted - good length delivery and this one nipped back in sharply after pitching outside the off stump. Ryder never picked it up and was beaten comprehensively, loud appeal and up goes the finger.
good length delivery on the stumps, defended
angled across the right-hander, played away watchfully
defended off the back-foot and the ball rolls away straight to the fielder at short cover
good length and Guptill drives it past the fielder at short cover, the call is loud and clear and they scamper through for a single
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Guptill gets behind the line and defends it down to mid-on
another good delivery on the stumps, Guptill stays back and defends it with a straight bat
again defended with a straight bat, ball rolls away on the off side
fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Guptill drives it straight back to the bowler on the bounce
punched down to mid-off, watchfully played
edged away to third man -  good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Guptill was looking to work it away on the leg side but the shot was not timed well enough
short of a good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and Guptill leaves it through to the keeper
closer to the off stump line, Guptill pushes forward and drives, ball clips the inside edge and runs down to fine leg
good length delivery outside the off stump, McCullum moves forward and across and looks to play it away on the off side but ends up with an inside edge on to his pad
slightly short and bit of width offered outside the off stump, McCullum looks to hit through the line with no footwork and the ball zips past the outside edge
on the middle and off stump line, ball stayed a bit low after hitting the deck and McCullum ends up with an inside edge on to his pad
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, McCullum moves across a long way and looks to defend but fails to make contact - loud appeal for lbw turned down

edged and gone! short of a good length delivery, pitched in the channel outside the off stump and shaping away a touch - Guptill stands tall on the back-foot and drives hard, ball clips the outside edge and goes straight to Sangakkara behind the stumps
played away on the leg side
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, defended away towards cover point
pitched up and coming in with the angle, Taylor leans forward and drives it away through the gap between mid-on and midwicket

three down! Kulasekara picks up another one! good length delivery, the one that nips back in. Taylor stays back and tries to flick it away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the pad. Umpire Ashoka de Silva had no hesitation whatsoever
defended outside the off stump
driven off the back-foot to the cover region
worked away off the pads and straight to the fielder at square leg
pitched up outside the off stump and McCullum drives it away towards cover
played away on the off side
good length delivery on the pads and Elliott turns it away towards square leg
good length delivery, pitched on middle and off and angling across the right-hander, Elliott shoulders arms
good length delivery, close to the off stump line and McCullum tamely plays it away towards cover

shot! good length delivery outside the off stump, McCullum pushes forward and punches it away through the gap between the cover fielders, once past the in-field the ball just raced away to the fence - powerful shot
defended down on the leg side and they scamper through for a single
good length delivery, coming in with the angle - Elliot gets forward and defends it with a straight bat
runs it down to third man for a single
punched away towards point
well disguised slower delivery, McCullum is beaten all ends up and the ball rolls away of the pad, loud appeal for lbw turned down - was clearly hit outside the line of the off stump
driven wide of the fielder at mid-on, quick single taken
good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing there - Elliot looks to defend off the back-foot and the ball zips past the outside edge
played away towards point, fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single
width offered outside the off stump but came slow off the track, Elliot looks to cut off the back-foot and ends up with an inside edge
full and on the pads, Elliot leans forward and drives it down to mid-on
flat delivery outside the off stump, defended stretching well forward
defended outside the off stump
full and on the pads, McCullum looks to sweep but makes no contact
solid defensive shot outside the off stump
leg-break, pitched outside the off stump and turning away - McCullum stays back and pushes it away towards point
quicker delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
beaten outside the off stump
in the channel outside the off stump, defended
played away on the off side, no room for a single there
good length and angling across but no real width offered, Elliot moves across a bit and plays it away towards point
played away off the back-foot to the third man region
good length delivery, defended back to the bowler.
googly and the ball hits the pad, loud appeal turned down - looked close
pitched outside the off stump and turning in, Elliot goes back and defends it down on the off side, ball stayed low after hitting the deck but Elliot had it covered
pushed forward and drives it down to long-on for a single
swept away nicely to deep backward square leg
tossed up on the middle and off stump line and Elliot defends it back down the track
width offered outside the off stump and Elliot cuts it away in the air and straight to the man placed behind point, fell just short
looks to cut and ends up with a bottom edge
defended down on the leg side, Thushara follows it up nicely and cuts off the single
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line and McCullum cuts it away straight to the fielder at point
driven off the back-foot and the ball finds the fielder at cover
short and wide outside the off stump, McCullum cuts hard but the shot is not timed well enough and the ball rolls away off the bottom edge
walks across the stumps and drives the ball back to the bowler - maiden over!
slings one wide outside the off stump, Elliot stands tall and defends it away towards cover point
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Elliot moves across a bit and works it away towards midwicket
yorker outside the off stump, played away towards cover
short delivery on middle and off - defended standing tall
slow yorker on the middle and off stump line, Elliot picks it up early and plays it back down the track
short ball, Elliot nicely gets on top of the bounce and pulls it away to deep backward square leg
good length delivery outside the off stump, probably the off-cutter. Elliot gets behind the line and drives it down to mid-off
clipped away off the pads and straight to the fielder at midwicket
leg-cutter, came in slow and Elliot defends it down on the off side
drifting down the leg side and the ball rolls away of the pad to the square leg region
driven off the back-foot, straight to the fielder at cover - it's all looking a bit dull
on the middle and off stump line, McCullum only manages to tap it away towards cover

good length delivery outside the off stump, Elliott pushes forward to defend and the ball runs away off the outside edge - fielder in the deep moves across quickly to his left and cuts off the boundary
142 kmp and it's a yorker outside the off stump, Elliott digs it away on the off side
played down on the off side and they scamper through for a single
good bouncer on middle and leg, McCullum sways away late
another bouncer and the ball goes through to the keeper, this time saw McCullum charging down the track and deliberately pulled it back
played away off the back-foot to the cover region, was the slower delivery
drifting down the leg side, poor delivery and Elliott neatly flicks it away to the fine leg fence
defended watchfully
defended down on the off side
short of a good length delivery, driven away towards cover
slightly short and cutting in, McCullum stays back and cuts it away towards point
edged down to third man, easy single to end the over
makes room and Malinga follows McCullum, played away towards cover
yorker on the stumps and McCullum digs it out towards cover
short of a good length delivery on the stumps, McCullum makes rooms and cuts it away towards point, Dilshan moves across quickly from backward point and cuts off the single
pulled away through square leg, not a well timed shot
slower delivery outside the off stump and Elliott squeezes it down to third man, runs hard and Elliott makes it across safely for the second
defended outside the off stump and the ball goes straight to Dilshan behind point
clipped away on the leg side, diving stop at midwicket cuts off the single
on the stumps and McCullum finds the fielder at midwicket, nothing new
drifting down the leg side, Sangakkara gets a touch on it
good length delivery outside the off stump, Elliott gets forward and drives it straight to the fielder at cover
on the stumps and that's driven straight back down the track to long-on, easy single
defended down towards silly mid-on, Mathews moves across to his right and cuts off the single
dropped! short delivery outside the off stump, McCullum cuts hard and ends up with a thick edge but Sangakkara, who is standing up, fails to hold on to a hard chance
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven back down the track

cleaned up! something had to happen -  good length delivery on the stumps, McCullum makes room and swings hard but fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the stumps. New Zealand in deep trouble here at 37 for 4.
well directed short ball, Oram never picked it up and the ball flies off the glove and over Sangakkara to the fence
good length delivery outside the off stump, bit wide outside the off stump and Oram leave it through to the keeper

another one bites the dust! good length delivery outside the off stump, shaping away a touch - Oram plays at it well away from his body and ends up with a faint edge. Sangakkara goes low and takes it cleanly. New Zealand 5 down.

bowled'm! good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, a slinger of a delivery, Nathan McCullum pushes forward to defend and is beaten for pace and the off stump is pegged back. Malinga on a hat-trick here.
good length delivery, driven straight back down the track
runs it down to third man for an easy single
edged away well wide of the slip fielder
width offered outside the off stump and Elliott cuts it away to deep backward point, diving stop in the deep cuts off the boundary
defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
cut away to deep backward point for a single
inswinging yorker on the middle and leg stump line, Elliott watchfully plays it away on the leg side
short delivery outside the off stump, Elliott sways away from it
good length delivery on the stumps, Elliott edges it away on the leg side and they scamper through for a single
yorker outside the off stump, pitched close to the off stump line - Vettori plays inside the line
full and drifting down the leg side
another yorker, this time it's well directed - Vettori somehow manages to get a touch on it and a loud appeal for lbw is turned down
fulltoss on the pads and Elliott plays it away through square leg
driven down to mid-off, straight to the fielder
pitched up outside the off stump, this time driven straight to the fielder at mid-on
slower delivery outside the off stump, Vettori waits for the ball and drives it through covers
on the middle and off stump line, defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
nice looking cover drive but straight to the fielder on the bounce
off-cutter to end the over, Elliott gets forward and defends it back down the track
forced away through point - easy single
on the pads and Elliot taps it away towards midwicket
on the pads, probably the slower delivery - Elliott moves across nicely and flicks it away fine
short ball and Elliott defends it in to the track
played away wide of the fielder at backward point, the fielder in the deep has lot of ground to cover and the batsmen scamper through for the second
wayward delivery down the leg side, the slower one gone wrong ?
good length delivery, close to the off stump line and Elliot defends it back down the track
clipped away off the pads to deep backward square leg
slower delivery outside the off stump, Elliott comes down the track and in the end is beaten by a long way
off-cutter on the middle and off stump line, Elliott gets inside the line and drives it away wide of the cover fielder
driven down to long-off for a single
pitched up on middle and off, driven wide of the fielder at mid-off
played back to the bowler, came off the inner half of the bat
punched off the back-foot, straight to the fielder at mid-off
slightly short and Elliott drives it straight to the fielder at cover
pushed well forward and drives the ball down to long-on, easy single
flat delivery outside the off stump, defended off the back-foot
driven away off the pads to deep midwicket
edged away to short third man, finishes the over in well under three minutes
driven down to mid-on
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight back down the track to long-off, takes on the fielder in the deep and they come back for the second
pitched up outside the off stump and angling away further - Vettori goes after it but fails to make contact
played back to the bowler
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, this one kept low after hitting the deck, Vettori swings across the line but fails to make contact
forced away off the front-foot and Vettori gets it away wide of the fielder at cover, quick single added to the total
moves forward and across and clips the ball down to fine leg, easy single to end the over
played away on the off side and they scamper through for a single
the one that straightens after hitting the deck, Vettori plays it away on the leg side
gone! slightly short and on the middle and off stump line, Vettori swings across the line and is beaten by the lack of bounce. As plumb as it gets
goes for the drive outside the off stump and the ball races away off the outside edge to the third man fence
on the middle and off stump line, defended stretching well forward
defended down on the off side, end of a successful over
driven off the back-foot to deep cover
on the middle and off stump line, the one that goes straight on - Butler pushes forward to defend, jumble of bat and pad, appeal for lbw turned down
worked away through square leg
premeditated sweep but the ball goes through everything
flighted delivery outside the off stump, Butler is sucked into the drive and is beaten outside the off stump
drifting down the leg side and Butler plays it away to fine leg for a brace
driven off the back-foot and Elliott gets it through the gap between the cover fielders
forced away off the front-foot and the ball rolls away square on the off side
punched down to long-on
looks to flick it away on the leg side and ends up with an inside edge
looks to work it away on the leg side, ball clips the outside half of the bat and rolls away on the off side
driven off the back-foot, straight to the fielder at cover
cut away behind point, no room for a single there
driven off the front-foot, gets it wide of the fielder at mid-off
defended outside the off stump
googly and Butler ends up playing down the wrong line, impact was well outside the line of the off stumps, loud appeal turned down
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
turning in and once again Butler is beaten comprehensively, another loud appeal for lbw turned down
full and on the stumps, Elliot pushes forward and drives it down to long-on
driven in the air and just wide of Jayasuriya
short and turning away, Elliott stands tall on the back-foot and punches it away through cover
cut away behind point, fails it get it past the fielder there
driven straight back to the bowler
forced away off the back-foot to the deep cover, easy single to end the over
the one that goes straight on - Butler looks to defend but fails to make contact and the ball goes past Sangakkara
down the leg side and the ball runs away off the keeper's pad
flat delivery outside the off stump, Elliot pushes well forward and clips it away through midwicket
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Butler defends and the ball rolls away off the outside edge
driven down to long-on and the 100 comes up
punched off the back-foot, straight back but Mendis fails to stop it cleanly
Elliott's long vigil comes to an end. Flat delivery on the stumps, Elliot comes down the track and yorks himself, fails to make contact and the ball crashes into the woodwork.
low fulltoss on the pads and Tuffey plays it away on the leg side
defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
pitched up outside the off stump and Butler drives it down to long-off
tossed up outside the off stump, Tuffey pushes forward to defend and is beaten all ends up
quicker delivery outside the off stump and Tuffey ends up playing down the wrong line
pitched wide outside the off stump and turning in but not enough to make Butler play at it
big swing and a miss outside the off stump
defended stretching well forward, bat and pad held together
flat delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
cut away late to the short third man region
driven away through extra cover
fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Butler hammers it down to long-on
played away on the leg side
Max! comes down the track, gets to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it straight back over the bowler's head for the first six of the match
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Butler pushes forward to defend and gets hit on the pad, loud appeal turned down - impact was outside the line of the off side
nudged away behind square leg
defended straight back to the bowler, was in the air for sometime but fell short of Mendis
goes for the sweep and gets beaten

googly - Tuffey looks to tap it away on the off side but ends up with an inside edge and the ball rolls back and is run out by Sangakkara. Tuffey failed to pick up the ball roll back and was looking for a run there
pushed wide of the fielder at point
worked away behind point for a single
googly down the leg side
another googly, pitched outside the off stump and turning in - Bond fails to get bat on ball and is hit on the pad
all over! It's a Malinga special, full and on the stumps, Butler fails to get his bat down in time and the ball crashes into the stumps. Sri Lanka win by 97 runs
